plot: They are ready to sacrifice for their own country to bring a better future. But no dream becomes real if someone betrays in the group.
title: The Lost Dream
plot_es: They are ready to sacrifice for their own country to bring a better future. But no dream becomes real if someone betrays in the group.
plot_en: They are ready to sacrifice for their own country to bring a better future. But no dream becomes real if someone betrays in the group.
